snippet: President Nicolás Maduro of Venezuela announced his decision regarding Edward J. Snowden, the former N.S.A. contractor, after Mr. Snowden was turned down by several countries.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro says he will offer asylum to fugitive intelligence contractor Edward J Snowden, who has been stranded in Moscow airport for nearly a week.

byline.original: By WILLIAM NEUMAN and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN
byline.contributor: María Eugenia Díaz contributed reporting from Caracas, Venezuela.

lead_paragraph: President Nicolás Maduro of Venezuela announced his decision regarding Edward J. Snowden, the former N.S.A. contractor, after Mr. Snowden was turned down by several countries.

headline.print_headline: Venezuela Offers Asylum to N.S.A. Leaker
